summary: This mod adds some of the missed items in the original Weightless Items mod and adds compatibility for the official DLCs.
descriptionHtml:
As a long time fan of the Weightless Items mod, I have always been frustrated by the few items (Centurion Dynamo Core, Linen Wraps, Mammoth Tusks) that are missing as well as the lack of DLC support.

Finally, the OCD became too much, giving birth to this mod. This will make Dawnguard, Hearthfire, and Dragonborn potions, ingredients, and numerous misc items weightless.

Simply place at the end of your load order. Requires Dawnguard, Hearthfire, and Dragonborn.

While you can use this mod without the Weightless Items mod, doing so makes no sense. This was designed to work with that mod, which can be found here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1622/?
author: KainTFM
